resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660c-2ebc-444d-2117-13177a06d677#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Sas formájú fibula, 500 körül, Germanisches Nationalmuseum, Nürnberg, 12 cm, arany, rekeszes gránátkő.</string>
            <string language="en">Eagle-formed fibula, ca. 500l, Germanisches Nationalmuseum, Nuremberg, 12 cm, gold, cellular garnet.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Adler-gebildetes Wadenbein, ca. 500l, 
Germanisches Nationalmuseum, Nürnberg, 12 Zentimeter, Gold, 
zellularer Granat.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">péroné Aigle-formé, ca. 500l, Germanisches 
Nationalmuseum, Nuremberg, 12 centimètres, or, grenat cellulaire.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fibula Águia-dado forma, ca. 500l, Germanisches 
Nationalmuseum, Nuremberg, 12 cm, ouro, garnet celular.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fibula Aquila-formato, ca. 500l, Germanisches 
Nationalmuseum, Norimberga, 12 centimetri, oro, granato cellulare.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αετός-διαμορφωμένη περόνη, περίπου 500l, 
Germanisches Nationalmuseum, Νυρεμβέργη, 12 εκατ., χρυσός, 
κυψελοειδής γρανάτης.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">peroné A'guila-formado, ca. 500l, Germanisches 
Nationalmuseum, Nuremberg, 12 centímetros, oro, granate celular.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az 5. század gazdag ábrázoló művészetéről tanúskodó rekeszzománc munka, melyet Domagnanóban, Itáliában találtak.</string>
            <string language="en">The cloisonné enamel work giving evidence of the luxuriant representational art of the 5th century, discovered in Domagnano, Italy</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">rekeszzománc,  osztrogót munka,  </string>
            <string language="en">cloisonné enamel, ostrogothic work</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die cloisonné Emaillearbeit, die Beweis der luxuriösen 
representational kunst des 5. Jahrhunderts, entdeckt in Domagnano, 
Italien gibt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le travail d'émail de cloisonné démontrant de l'art 
représentatif luxuriant du 5ème siècle, découvert dans Domagnano, 
Italie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O trabalho do esmalte do cloisonné que dá a evidência 
da arte luxuriant do representational do ö século, descoberta em 
Domagnano, Italy</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il lavoro dello smalto del cloisonné che dà prova di 
arte luxuriant di representational del quinto secolo, scoperta in 
Domagnano, Italia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εργασία σμάλτων cloisonnι που δίνει τα στοιχεία 
της άφθονης αντιπροσωπευτικής τέχνης του 5$ου αιώνα, που 
ανακαλύπτεται σε Domagnano, Ιταλία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El trabajo del esmalte del cloisonné que da la evidencia 
del arte luxuriant del representational del 5to siglo, descubierto en 
Domagnano, Italia</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">cloisonné Emaille, ostrogothic Arbeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">émail de cloisonné, travail ostrogothic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">esmalte do cloisonné, trabalho ostrogothic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">smalto del cloisonné, lavoro ostrogothic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">cloisonnι σμάλτο, ostrogothic εργασία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">esmalte del cloisonné, trabajo ostrogothic</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
